data.title: Patrick Tekely on LinkedIn: Thanks David Rebibo, Maria Cristila Cabanting, & Amanda Ho for the invite…
data.meta_description: Thanks David Rebibo, Maria Cristila Cabanting, & Amanda Ho for the invite to the HSBC Asian Outlook 2020 seminar last week. Engaging insights provided by all…
data.text:
While the introduction of T+1 is not intended to increase FX settlement risk; this is a potential consequence for those who are not prepared for the change. BNY Mellon has been preparing for the ways clients may be impacted and creating solutions to help make the trade process more seamless, transparent, reliable: https://lnkd.in/dTb4fKAp #T1AtBNYMellon

Same-day execution, extended trade windows, new platforms...all designed to help you execute FX settlements across the globe under the new T+1 deadlines. BNY Mellon’s SecuritiesFX solutions and capabilities can fully service your T+1 needs through each step of the settlement cycle. Learn more about our FX capabilities: https://lnkd.in/gqkqScpG #T1AtBNYMellon

We’re excited to announce that BNY Mellon has been shortlisted for the 2024 FTF News Technology Innovation Awards for the Best Solution for T+1 Transition. We are dedicated to helping our clients navigate the upcoming accelerated settlement cycle and look forward to seeing their success. We appreciate your support and would love to have your vote. Voting is open through May 3, 2024. https://bit.ly/49HRAnJ

Are you executing FX trades in APAC and EMEA? With the upcoming T+1 transition, the window for FX execution narrows significantly, increasing risk of missing cut-offs or failing trades. Make sure you know how BNY Mellon can support you ahead of the transition: https://lnkd.in/gqEhxkhE #T1AtBNYMellon

What wonderful performances by the ARTDIS (Singapore) Ltd puppeteers as well as the actors in “Smartypants and the Swordfish”, a theatre production held as a part of Neurodiversity Week. If you read one thing today, please make it Angela Tan’s message. No words or summary I can write will do it justice. It was a pleasure to attend closing day today. Thanks to the team for having me!

BNY Mellon is celebrating 50 years in Singapore, a massive milestone, and I was honored to receive a token of appreciation for my efforts with HEART Singapore at our annual dinner. Our mission is to create an inclusive culture for people with diverse abilities, and we are proud to have a great team in place to drive this forward. We believe that everyone has a unique set of abilities and talents that should be celebrated and embraced. If you're interested in partnering with us to further our mission, please don't hesitate to reach out. I’d love to hear from you!

Had a blast hosting our FX booth at BNY Mellon’s Innovation Centre Lab Crawl last week in line with the Singapore FinTech Festival. The crawl highlighted our clients’ journey through #innovation, with our booth focused on the “Customer Experience”. It was fulfilling to see so much interest across both our public and client sessions. As the world’s largest custodian, we are in a unique position to identify market trends via tracking 20% of global asset flows. Appreciative of everyone that stopped for an engaging conversation about iFlow as well as to those who subscribed to receive critical flow insights from our strategists. Special thanks to Victoria Sanchez and Winnie Chong for all the effort in organizing such a great event!

Excited to host one of our ‘Interactive Experiences’ next week at the Innovation Lab Crawl, as a part of the Singapore Fintech Festival, focusing on the BNY Mellon Customer Experience as it relates to innovation in FX. There are some great panels lined up as well with Amaar Khan and Amy Tong discussing “The Digital Revolution”. Stop by and say Hi in either of the sessions on November 14th, 9:30am-12pm or 1:30pm-4pm! Sign up at https://lnkd.in/gy6JWAEC #bnymellon #singaporefintechfestival #sff2023 #customerexperience #innovation #fintech #fx
